scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV="test" mocha -r adana-dump --compilers js:babel-core/register tests/**/*.spec.js src/**/*
scripts.lcov: npm run coverage && cat ./coverage/coverage.json | ./node_modules/.bin/adana --format lcov > coverage/lcov.info
scripts.htmlcov: npm run coverage && cat ./coverage/coverage.json | ./node_modules/.bin/adana --format html > coverage/coverage.html
scripts.clean: npm run clean-build && npm run clean-coverage && npm run clean-deps
scripts.build: npm run clean-build && cd src && babel -d ../build '**/*.js'
scripts.watch: npm run clean-build && cd src && babel --watch -d ../build '**/*.js'
